channel.title: Need Perfect Barrage
channel.description:
Hello, Can anyone help me add Perfect Barrage. By that I mean Barrage that won't let people run after being freezed while moving. Also, if you mass click them with barrage you run up to the target and nothing happens. Base is Delta [317].
-Unleashed[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2009, 04:42:48 pm[/size][hr]BUU
